duties_responsibilities.duty: Design printed circuit boards and breadboards, program field-programmable gate arrays, and assemble prototypes of miniaturized solid-state quantum magnetometers.
Experience in mixed analog-digital signals circuit design, PCB design, and interfacing field-programmable gate arrays with A/D converters.
Familiarity with digital signal processing is desirable.
Work collaboratively with colleagues to integrate apparatus design and construction.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or relevant field (Master's preferred)
